# Wolff-Parkinson-White Syndrome

-   ECG Triad:
    -   short PR interval
    -   wide QRS
    -   'delta wave' - slurring slow rise of initial portion of the QRS

::: callout-warning
Avoid AV-nodal blocking agents in AFib w/ WPW
:::
